document.full_text: mr. cryer and ms. hendricks are joining katie finneran, a tony winner for "promises, promises," in cast that already includes neil patrick harris, patti lupone, anika noni rose and stephen colbert.
document.title: jon cryer and christina hendricks join philharmonic's 'company'
lines_and_colors: mr. cryer and ms. hendricks are joining katie finneran, a tony winner for "promises, promises," in cast that already includes neil patrick harris, patti lupone, anika noni rose and stephen colbert.
